xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 07 July 2014
xwikidoc.content: <akats> has joined #phenotips 10:41 <mcupak> has quit 11:38 <meatcar> has quit 12:02 <meatcar> has quit 12:14 <akats> sdumitriu: I'm faced with a problem, and I'm note sure if it's significant enough to spend time solving. For example: There is a subsection called Deafness. It has an id, and is rendered on the patient sheet as NA/Y/N Deafness. The y/n picker is the default one, and if yes is clicked, Deafness is seen in the Current Selection. If the page is saved, and is being reviewed, it no longer says Deafness but the title of the underlying id, which in this case is Hea 12:14 <akats> Is that a "real" problem? 12:16 <sdumitriu1> Kind of... 12:16 <sdumitriu1> Are you at the lab? 12:18 <akats> Lab? 12:18 <akats> Office? 12:18 <akats> Yes 12:19 <akats> That's what I thought too. It will be confusing to people. But I don't think the solution is an easy one. 12:19 <sdumitriu1> OK, be there soon 13:24 <akats> Sergiu did I not write code a long time ago to convert deprecated ids into current? 13:26 <sdumitriu> Yes you did 13:26 <sdumitriu> And it should be in the platform 13:26 <sdumitriu> But it might have been moved... 13:36 <meatcar> has quit 14:19 <meatcar> has quit 14:33 <akats> has quit 14:42 <meatcar_> is now known as <meatcar> 14:42 <meatcar> has quit 14:55 <meatcar> has quit 14:58 <meatcar_away> is now known as <meatcar> 14:58 <meatcar> has quit 15:10 <meatcar> has quit 15:15 <meatcar_away> is now known as <meatcar> 15:15 <meatcar> has quit 15:25 <meatcar> has quit 15:30 <meatcar_away> is now known as <meatcar> 15:30 <meatcar> has quit 17:15 <meatcar> has quit 17:17 <meatcar_away> is now known as <meatcar> 17:17 <meatcar> has quit 17:30 <meatcar> has quit 17:31 <meatcar_away> is now known as <meatcar> 17:31 <meatcar> has quit 21:46 <meatcar_> is now known as <meatcar> 21:46 <meatcar> has quit 22:04 <meatcar> has quit 22:10 <meatcar_> is now known as <meatcar> 22:39 <meatcar> has quit 22:43 <meatcar_> is now known as <meatcar> 22:43 <meatcar> has quit 22:45 <jim__> has quit
